about_the_game:
Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker is a puzzle game where you reveal a beautiful image hidden behind the stack of blocks using traditional block breaking mechanics.

IN THE ZONE


Smash those blocks non-stop and be amazed seeing the image slowly being revealed in real-time like a jigsaw. A relaxing experience that keeps you totally engrossed. Your brain's gonna be like, "Just one more section, please!"

AT YOUR PACE

The interface was carefully designed to give you total freedom. Pick which part of the image to uncover, how many waves of blocks to bust, and how many will pop up from the bottom. Accessible from youngsters to senior gamers!

MAKE IT YOUR GAME

Use your own images as stages! Hang out with your favorite pics or the curated list of +30 preloaded images of beautiful nature as you like.

EXTRA FEATURES


  • Preview strip - Your upcoming piece is always at eye level. Less eye travelling and more focus.
  • Undo key - Made a mistake? No problem! Less frustration, more fun.
  • No Game Over - Checkpoints make sure you won't lose your progress.
  • Unlock Edit mode - after completing the stage.

name: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10*
  • Processor: Intel Celeron / AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: * will not work on Linux systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker is a puzzle game where you reveal a beautiful image hidden behind the stack of blocks using block breaking logic.
